snippet.title: BLACK Game Official Trailer (2006) - Nostalgia
snippet.description:
Black is a FPS known for its heavily stylized cinema-inspired action (The Rock, Die Hard, ...) as well as its sound quality and its destructible environments ! Join us on Facebook http://facebook.com/GameNewsOfficial & Twitter http://twitter.com/gamenewstrailer.

[Nostalgia] Black Game Trailer HD. The game, developed by Criterion Games and published by Electronic Arts (EA) was released on 2006 for Xbox and PS2. Subscribe now to get the latest game teasers, gameplay trailers, videogame walkthrough and ingame videos !
